Package gui

Class MainFrame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
gui.MainFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
Function that encompasses all other panels and controls conditions which need to be met in order for panels to be displayed. This class is implemented as Singleton.
Since:
22.06.2020.
See Also:
